price: Dhugaan ni mirkanaa’e; wanti isaan hojjataa turan ni bade.
arabic: فَوَقَعَ ٱلۡحَقُّ وَبَطَلَ مَا كَانُواْ يَعۡمَلُونَ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: fawaqaʿa al-ḥaqu wabaṭala mā kānū yaʿmalūna
